videoJson.name: Video8
videoJson.fact1: This format's appeal was around its smaller size, which made for much lighter camcorders than VHS or Betamax
videoJson.fact2: This format was the first 8mm video tape format; its later predecessors were  Hi8 and Digital8
videoJson.fact3: This format was initially launched by Kodak but Sony ended up dominating the market with its Handycam camcorder line
videoJson.fact4: Fun fact about all 8mm: there was no separate linear audio track; it all AFM, recorded in the video signal, from the jump
